mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, password, user_name, birth_year, birth_month, birth_day, address, signflag, social_id) values(#{userId}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{birthYear}, #{birthMonth}, #{birthDay}, #{address}, #{signflag}, #{socialId})
mapper.select: select * from user where social_id = #{id} and signflag = #{signflag} and is_del = 'N'
